entries.message: Fix stuck batch jobs — auto-complete jobs when all playlists finish, reduce stale job timeout from 2hr to 30min
Fix negative elapsed time by parsing D1 timestamps as UTC
Fix horizontal scrolling on mobile — wrap filter chips, adjust queue column widths, add body overflow guard
Add billing & usage tracking — every AI API call (OpenAI LLM + Replicate image gen) is now logged with cost, tokens, and metadata
Refactor settings into sidebar layout with General and Billing sub-pages
Add stacked bar chart (Recharts) showing daily OpenAI vs Replicate costs with time range selector
Add usage audit table with color-coded action badges, relative timestamps, and pagination
Move pricing module from worker to shared package for cross-workspace reuse
Fix missing album art on tracks with Spotify name suffixes via fuzzy snapshot matching + music note placeholder
Add collaborative filter toggle — hides collaborative playlists by default, persists preference in localStorage
Store enriched Spotify data: snapshot_id, is_public, contributor detection via added_by, track metadata (addedAt, releaseDate, explicit)
Detect collaborative playlists by analyzing track contributors — badge on dashboard + detail page, generation blocked for multi-contributor playlists
Pause/resume auto-detect watcher independently of cron — toggle + configurable 5/10/15 min poll interval in queue banner
One-time backfill endpoint to scan all existing playlists for contributor data
Style preview generation now uses the style's own model, LoRA, guidance, and seed instead of hardcoded flux-dev defaults
Add timeout + consecutive error tolerance to thumbnail and preview Replicate polling
Dynamic robots.txt, sitemap.xml, page titles with template, OpenGraph metadata
Auto-detect watcher with 10-minute stabilization, smart cron skip, soft delete, retry utility
Live cron/batch progress panel replaces kanban when a job is running — shows pending/in-progress/done columns with per-playlist step tracking
'Next scheduled run' banner with local timezone display when idle
Queue nav icon pulses green when a job is active; hover shows rich tooltip with current playlist, step, and progress
Stat cards and generation history table update live during active jobs — no page refresh needed
Time picker auto-detects browser timezone — displays and accepts local time, converts to UTC behind the scenes
New GET /api/queue/status endpoint powers global queue awareness via QueueProvider context
Two-step Schedule → Run workflow replaces single Generate button — stage playlists, configure, then trigger
Per-item analysis mode: choose 'with lyrics analysis' (full pipeline) or 'without' (light extraction from your description)
Column-contextual actions: Select All + Schedule on To Do, Run on Scheduled, Retry Failed on Done
Collaborative and non-owned playlists shown as locked with 'Not included' badge — excluded from generation
Playlist name now steers theme selection — cover art aligns with what the playlist name evokes
Light extraction mode: one LLM call derives object + aesthetic context from your text description
Custom object override in image review modal — specify your own subject to bypass AI extraction
Queue page now flows naturally with footer at bottom instead of fixed viewport height
Queue action bar sticks below navbar when scrolling down the page
Optimistic UI on Generate — items move to Scheduled instantly instead of waiting 15s for worker response
Auto-refresh when new version deployed — users always see latest code
Global error boundary with ChunkLoadError auto-recovery after deploys
Persist style version preview images to R2 instead of expiring Replicate URLs
Fix thumbnail rendering — use native img for R2-proxied images
Restore viewport-height kanban with internal column scrolling
Footer now always pinned to bottom of every page via flex column layout
Persist style thumbnails to R2 instead of storing expiring Replicate URLs
Add retry logic to deploy verification for CDN propagation lag
Fix image generation crash for flux-2-pro models (output is string, not array)
Exclude /api/version from auth so CI can verify deployments
Fix Vercel and CI builds failing due to missing HugeIcons npm auth token
Add deployment verification — CI now confirms live site version after each deploy
Add /api/version endpoint for programmatic version checks
Add explicit type="button" to all non-submit buttons
Remove dead prompt-builder module, stale style definitions, and outdated planning docs
Canonical thumbnails: every style card shows a generated boombox image in that style's aesthetic
Style deletion with custom confirmation modal and cascading version cleanup
Default style picker in Settings using custom searchable dropdown
Style creator → analysis → editor flow: upload images, Claude analyzes, generates heuristics
Reusable ConfirmDialog component using native dialog element with destructive variant
Custom Dropdown component with keyboard navigation, search filtering, and ARIA support
KGO thumbnail now uses Flux 2 Pro model (migration 010 applied to D1)
Stale RSC cache after style deletion — added revalidatePath and router.refresh
Kuro Gin Orenjiiro style: FLUX LoRA trained on 16 reference images (60% black / 30% silver / 10% orange, faceted stone, amber backlight)
Seed all 7 styles into D1 database — styles table was previously empty
Generation history table with stale-while-revalidate caching, cost tracking, and breakdown tooltips
Playlist detail page with full analysis transparency: track extractions, convergence, object scoring, generation history
Song-level extraction caching via song_extractions table — skip LLM calls for previously analyzed tracks
Object scoring with tier weights (high=3, medium=2, low=1) aggregated into convergence prompt
Cost tracking end-to-end: token counts, per-step breakdown, total cost per generation
Dark-mode safe colors replacing hardcoded Tailwind green/yellow/red
R2 key path validation in image proxy — reject traversal and non-PNG paths
Mobile responsive kanban: horizontal snap-scroll below md breakpoint, 4-column grid on desktop
Dynamic footer clearance via ResizeObserver — column padding adapts to actual footer height
ARIA landmarks: region roles on board and columns, aria-live progress summary, role=alert on errors, sr-only loading text
Done bucket thumbnails now show generated images instead of original Spotify covers
Progress summary hidden when no playlists loaded (no more '0 of 0 generated')
Scale pass: 48px cover art, 24px checkboxes (WCAG 2.5.8), text-sm status labels, larger action buttons and footer controls
Color consistency: amber-* replaced with --color-warning tokens, Done bucket uses neutral badge (distinct from Selected green)
Layout fix: fragment replaced with flex container, broken calc() height removed, viewport-filling dvh-based sizing
Footer uses .glass class instead of inline glassmorphism, safe-area padding for macOS dock, min-h-[48px] action bar prevents layout shift
Queue page with 3-column kanban board for batch cover generation
Batch trigger: select multiple playlists, choose style override, generate all at once
Live progress tracking: step-by-step status (fetching tracks, extracting themes, generating image, uploading)
Image review modal with side-by-side comparison (generated vs Spotify current) and revision notes
Worker /trigger endpoint: POST-only with bearer token authentication
Revision notes support: prepend guidance to image generation prompt for iterative refinement
New API routes: /api/playlists/generate-batch, /api/playlists/[id]/regenerate, /api/generations, /api/styles
Queue nav link added between Playlists and Settings
Dashboard quick action cards linking to Queue and Playlists
Renamed dall_e_prompt column to prompt (migration 004)
Stale processing detection: playlists stuck >5 minutes auto-reset to idle
SPEC.md updated: DALL-E 3 → Replicate Flux Schnell, fixed file paths, removed Clerk references
Universal button standard (px-3 py-2 text-xs) applied across all components
Login page redesign: breathing DISC logo background, large Spotify CTA, 'Welcome to DISC' heading
DISC logo footer button with green fireworks easter egg (fireworks-js)
Max-width standardized to 1280px (max-w-7xl) across dashboard, changelog, and footer
Lighter skeleton loader and staleTimes RSC caching for faster navigation
BackToTop only shows on scrollable pages; breathing logos avoid hero zone and footer
Changelog page at /changelog with search, fuzzy word matching, and highlighted results
What's New? nav link visible on all pages (authenticated and unauthenticated) with pulsing unread indicator
5 new art styles: Neon Noir, Soft Watercolor, Brutalist Collage, Chromatic Glass, Ukiyo-e Wave
Structured changelog.json with types, utilities, and version-bump.sh integration
Production deployment: disc.400.dev live with Spotify OAuth, TLS, and all worker secrets
Footer with 400 Faces branding, dynamic copyright year, and clickable Changelog version badge
Pulsing blue unread indicator on user avatar when new changelog entries exist
What's New menu item in user dropdown with unread dot
Auto-mark changelog as seen on visit, per-user tracking in D1
Breadcrumb navigation on changelog page (Home > Changelog)
Fix Vercel env vars with trailing newline causing INVALID_CLIENT on Spotify OAuth
Set AUTH_URL to production domain for correct OAuth redirect
Refined versioning strategy: PATCH for invisible changes, MINOR for user-visible, MAJOR for breaking
version-bump.sh now scaffolds changelog.json entries automatically
Full image generation pipeline: lyrics extraction, tiered object analysis, collision-aware convergence, Replicate Flux Schnell generation
9 cron worker modules: crypto, image, replicate, spotify, pipeline, lyrics, openai, extraction, index
GPT-4o-mini batch extraction and convergence (2 LLM calls per playlist, ~$0.002 total)
Collision detection: cross-playlist claimed objects registry with supersede logic
Change detection with tiered thresholds (50% for 2 or fewer tracks, 33% for 3, 25% for 4+)
lyrics.ovh integration with 5s timeout, concurrency 5, and metadata fallback
@cf-wasm/photon JPEG compression for Spotify upload (under 192KB)
D1 schema additions: styles, playlist_analyses, claimed_objects tables; generations audit columns
Dashboard overview: active style card, pipeline timeline, playlist stats, recent generations
Settings page: schedule configuration, art style selector, account management
NavItems with active state indicator (aria-current)
6 art styles seeded: Bleached Crosshatch, Neon Noir, Soft Watercolor, Brutalist Collage, Chromatic Glass, Ukiyo-e Wave
R2 image archival with structured key paths
AES-256-GCM encryption via Web Crypto API (worker-compatible)
BUILDPLAN.md with full Phase 3.5 implementation notes
Playlists grid moved from / to /playlists
NavDock restructured: logo to /, playlists to /playlists, settings to /settings
Focus-visible rule extended to input, select, and textarea elements
getDashboardData wrapped in try/catch with error state fallback
Design system: glassmorphism, Spotify green aura, 4-concentric-ring logo
CSS custom properties for all design tokens (colors, spacing, radii, typography)
Glass utility class with backdrop blur, border, and shadow
Aura utility class with gradient glow effect
Text hierarchy with WCAG contrast: primary 15:1, secondary 7.8:1, muted 4.7:1
Global focus-visible: Spotify green outline on all interactive elements
Skip-to-content link for keyboard navigation
NavDock with server-side auth and client-side UserDropdown
Auth.js v5 (beta.30) with Spotify OAuth provider
Single-user gate: only evancnavarro can sign in
AES-256-GCM encrypted refresh token storage in D1
D1 REST API access layer (Vercel cannot bind D1 natively)
Spotify API helpers: fetch playlists with pagination
Dashboard layout with auth middleware protection
Playlist grid with Spotify cover thumbnails
Playlist sync: Spotify to D1 via after() callback
Edge Runtime compatibility: split auth.config.ts (Edge-safe) from auth.ts (Node)
Monorepo scaffolding: apps/web, workers/cron, packages/shared
Next.js 16 with Tailwind v4 and DISC design tokens
Cloudflare Worker stub with D1 database binding
Shared types (Spotify Feb 2026 compliant), styles, and version module
D1 migration: users, playlists, generations, jobs tables
Biome linting and formatting
GitHub Actions CI (lint + typecheck)
Version management: version-bump.sh, version-check.sh pre-push gate
Husky hooks: pre-commit (lint-staged), commit-msg (commitlint), pre-push (version, lint, typecheck)
